Springboro Ordinances

Codified Ordinances of Springboro, Ohio

CHAPTER 1240 General Provisions, Authority and Enforcement

1240.01Title.

1240.02Policy.

1240.03Purposes.

1240.04Authority.

1240.05Jurisdiction.

1240.06Administration.

1240.07Enactment.

1240.08Interpretation, conflict and separability.

1240.09Saving provision.

1240.10Amendments.

1240.11Public purpose.

1240.12Variances, exceptions and waiver of conditions.

1240.13Enforcement, violations and penalties.

CROSS REFERENCES

Authority to adopt subdivision regulations – see Ohio R.C. 711.101

Violation of subdivision regulations – see Ohio R.C. 711.102

Effective date – see Ohio R.C. 711.132

Planning commission shall be the platting commission – see Ohio R.C. 713.03

Conformity of plans to comprehensive plan – see P. & Z. 1222.01(b)

Manager is Planning Director – see ADMIN. 230.01
